metadata.dc:title: Preventive activities to the test: new debates on Community Nursing
metadata.dc:description: The aim of this article is to give some thought to the preventive actionsand functions carried out in healthcare institutions.The existing ideology in terms of preventive actions is analysed fromdifferent theoretical aspects. Such ideology blames the individual for hisor her health problems, separating it from his or her living conditions.Community nursing proposes a dialog between the problems and healthneeds and living conditions. The goal is to deviate individual blaming andto approximate social and individual responsibility as the ideology thatshould be present in any nursing preventive activity
metadata.dc:creator: Díaz Sánchez, Verónica
metadata.dc:description: El objetivo de este artículo es reflexionar sobre los discursos preventivitasy las funciones de la institución sanitaria.Se critica desde diferentes marcos teóricos la ideología presente en lasactividades preventivas, ideología que culpabiliza a la persona de susproblemas de salud y la separa de sus condiciones de vida.Se propone desde la Enfermería Comunitaria un diálogo entre losproblemas y necesidades de salud y sus condiciones de vida. Desviar laculpabilización individual y acercar la responsabilidad social e individualcomo ideología presente en la actividad preventiva enfermera
